attributes.action: Get the homeless off the streets and stop them from dying on our streets
attributes.additional_details: Homeless people are literally dying on the streets of the UK through hypothermia there's been reports of at least 3 people found dead on the streets this should not be happening in 2019
attributes.background: It's time this government got its priorities right and stopped the people of Britain dying on our streets by providing them with permanent accommodation before allowing economic migrants in to the UK
